byline.original: By JEFF ZELENY and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

abstract: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey endorsed Mitt Romney in New Hampshire, just hours before the Republican Party's candidates gather for another debate.
snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey endorsed Mitt Romney in New Hampshire, just hours before the Republican Party's candidates gather for another debate.
lead_paragraph: 3:34 p.m. | Updated LEBANON, N.H. - Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey endorsed Mitt Romney's bid for the Republican presidential nomination on Tuesday afternoon by praising his business and government experience, declaring, "Mitt Romney is the man we need to lead America."

headline.main: Christie Endorses Romney Ahead of Debate
